scripts.build-wasm: docker build -t wasm-imagemagick-build-tools . && docker run --rm --workdir /code -v "$PWD":/code wasm-imagemagick-build-tools bash ./build.sh
scripts.build: npm run build-wasm && npm run build-ts
scripts.prepare: npm run build && npm run copy
scripts.copy: cp magick.js magick.wasm dist && cp magick.js magick.wasm spec/assets
scripts.test: npm run test-node && npm run test-browser
scripts.test-browser: rm -rf dist && npm run test-browser-build && gulp --gulpfile spec/gulpfile.js jasmine
scripts.test-browser-server: rm -rf dist && npm run test-browser-build && gulp --gulpfile spec/gulpfile.js jasmine-server
scripts.test-browser-build: npm run build-ts && cp -r spec/assets dist && npm run test-browser-bundle
scripts.test-browser-start: rm -rf dist && npm run build-ts && npm run copy && npm run test-browser-watch-all
